data.title: 2024 College Baseball Conference Tournaments; Schedules, Champions
data.meta_description: The 2024 College baseball conference tournaments for DI baseball take place in May. We have all of the conference tournament schedules listed for you below.
data.meta_site_name: Sports Brackets - The latest brackets and schedules for NBA, NFL, college basketball and more!
data.text:
The 2024 College baseball conference tournaments for DI baseball take place in May. We have all of the conference tournament schedules listed for you below. There will be 32 automatic qualifiers for the 2024 NCAA DI baseball tournament out of the mix. Several conferences do not hold a postseason tournament. Instead, their champion is the team in first place after the regular season. Many of the conferences like the Ivy League and SEC do not have all of the teams play in the tournament based on their standing in the conference.

2024 College Baseball Conference Tournaments

Here are the 2024 College baseball conference tournaments. The tournament schedule dates are out. Where we have the more in-depth tourney schedule, we link to that for you.

*Note: Tarleton State won the WAC Tournament. Since they are not eligible for the NCAA due to the 4-year transition rule, Grand Canyon was awarded the WAC bid to the 2024 NCAA DI tournament.

2024 College World Series Schedule

So, the College World Series schedule is the final part of the overall NCAA Division I Men’s Baseball Tournament. The NCAA holds the Selection Show on May 27th. The College World Series schedule pits the final eight teams against each other in Omaha. It is also known as the MCWS and CWS. Here is the overall schedule for the postseason play once the conference tournaments are finished for you. We have the 2024 CWS schedule and bracket up here for you as well.

Selection Show: Monday, May 27 at noon ET | ESPN2/ESPNU

Regionals: Friday-Monday, May 31-June 3

Super Regionals: Friday-Sunday, June 7-9 or Saturday-Monday, June 8-10

First day of MCWS games: Start Friday, June 14

MCWS finals: Saturday-Monday, June 22-23/24

College World Series Highlights (2023 CWS Championship)

Here’s highlights from the LSU vs Florida 2023 CWS Championship for you.
